home.heroSubtitle: Handcrafted Dates Stuffed with Nuts & Chocolate
home.heroBody: Dates stuffed with nuts, covered in chocolate, and beautifully wrapped for every occasion.

features.sustainableBody: We work directly with cacao farmers to ensure fair trade and quality.
features.awardBody: Recognized internationally for our exceptional craft and flavor.
features.handcraftedBody: Every piece is carefully made by our master chocolatiers.

home.signatureBody: Discover our most beloved creations, each one a testament to quality and craftsmanship.
home.giftsBody: Our beautifully curated gift sets are perfect for celebrations, thank you gifts, or simply treating someone special.
home.newsletterBody: Subscribe to get recipes, pairing tips, and exclusive offers delivered to your inbox.

shop.title: Shop All Chocolates
shop.subtitle: Explore our complete collection of handcrafted chocolates, from bold dark bars to elegant truffles.

reviewsExamples.review1: Absolutely divine! The perfect balance of rich chocolate and subtle sweetness.
reviewsExamples.review2: Best chocolate I've ever had. You can really taste the quality.

cart.emptyBody: Looks like you haven't added any chocolates to your cart yet.

checkout.orderConfirmedBody: Thank you for your order. We will contact you soon to confirm delivery details.
checkout.whatsappInstructions: Open WhatsApp to send your order to the shop. We will contact you on your phone to confirm delivery.
checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.whatsappNote: WhatsApp will open with your order details. Send the message to complete your order. Payment will be collected upon delivery.
checkout.cashOnDeliveryNote: Pay when you receive your order. We will contact you to confirm delivery details.

gifts.heroBody: Beautifully packaged chocolate gifts for every occasion.
gifts.directShippingBody: Send directly to your recipient with a gift receipt. Free shipping on orders over ₪50.
gifts.noGiftSets: No gift sets available at the moment.
gifts.corporateBody: Need many boxes for your team or clients? We can help you build a custom selection.

about.heroBody: Tamr Yafa is a small-batch chocolate kitchen inspired by local flavors and crafted with care.
about.craftedTitle: Crafted with Love, Rooted in Tradition
about.craftedBody1: Tamr Yafa started with a simple idea: make chocolate that feels personal—beautiful, generous, and unforgettable. We blend premium chocolate with flavors we grew up with, like dates and pistachio, then finish each piece by hand.
about.craftedBody2: We focus on quality ingredients, careful tempering, and small-batch production so every box tastes fresh and looks like a gift.
about.craftedBody3: From our kitchen in the Ramallah area, we prepare chocolates for everyday moments and special occasions—because the best gifts are the ones made with intention.

values.freshBody: We choose ingredients that taste clean and rich—so every bite feels premium.
values.qualityBody: Small batches, careful tempering, and consistent finishing—every time.
values.sharingBody: Our boxes are designed to be opened together—at home, at work, and at celebrations.
values.handcraftedBody: Every piece is finished by hand—because details are what make it special.

processSteps.selectBody: We choose premium chocolate and complementary ingredients for balanced flavor.
processSteps.craftBody: We temper, mold, fill, and finish each batch with careful timing and technique.
processSteps.decorateBody: Every piece is decorated to look as good as it tastes—gift-ready by default.
processSteps.packBody: We pack in sturdy, elegant boxes to arrive safely and beautifully.

about.footerBody: Handmade chocolates and gift boxes inspired by local taste—crafted to share.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Questions about an order, gift boxes, or delivery? Send us a message and we’ll reply as soon as possible.
contact.submittedBody: Thank you. We’ll get back to you soon.
contact.orderHelpBody: For faster support, include your phone number and the items you want (and any gift wrapping notes).

footer.aboutBody: Dates stuffed with nuts and covered in chocolate. Designed with decorations and colors suited for all occasions.

chocolateDates.name: Chocolate Dates
chocolateDates.description: A premium box of chocolate-covered dates, elegantly decorated and crafted for a refined gifting experience.

babyBoyGiftBox.name: Baby Boy Gift Box
babyBoyGiftBox.description: Blue-themed baby boy gift box with assorted chocolates, perfect for baby showers and first visits.

asafeeriQatayef.name: Asafeeri Qatayef
asafeeriQatayef.description: Delicate Asafeeri qatayef filled with rich, creamy filling and finished with a light touch of syrup. Soft, indulgent, and crafted to capture the authentic taste of traditional Arabic desserts.

eidAlAdhaCollection.name: Eid al-Adha Collection
eidAlAdhaCollection.description: A special Eid al-Adha gift box filled with mixed chocolates and decorated in a festive Eid theme. Perfect for family visits and celebrations.

palestinianCollection.name: Palestinian Collection Gift Box
palestinianCollection.description: Signature Palestinian-inspired collection with chocolate-covered dates and pralines, decorated in the colors and style of Palestine.

babyGirlGiftBox.name: Baby Girl Gift Box
babyGirlGiftBox.description: Pink-themed baby girl gift box with assorted chocolates, perfect for baby showers and first visits.

graduationGiftBox.name: Graduation Gift Box
graduationGiftBox.description: Graduation gift box with assorted chocolates, perfect for graduation ceremonies and celebrations.
